src_original: tatra kathaṁ sattvānusmṛtibhāvanā |  yaccittaṁ sarvasattvānāṁ kāyavākcittalakṣitam |

mamāpi tādṛśaṁ cittaṁ ākāśasamasāriṇam || 31 ||  -23- tatra kathaṁ sarvamantramūrtikāyavākcittānusmṛtibhāvanā |  yatkāyaṁ mantravajrasya vācā kāyavibhāvanam |  mamāpi tādṛśaṁ cittaṁ bhavenmantradharopamam || 32 ||
tatha kathaṁ prajñāpāramitāsamayānusmṛtibhāvanā |  prakṛtiprabhāsvarāḥ sarve anutpannā nirāśravāḥ |  na bodhirnābhisamayo navāntaṁ na ca sambhavaḥ || 34 ||
buddhakāya iti proktaḥ kāyajāpaḥ sa ucyate || 13 ||
vāgvajra iti prokto vāgjāpaḥ sa ucyate || 14 ||
cittasamayasambodhiḥ sthitivajravicāraṇam |  vajracittamiti proktaṁ cittajāpaḥ sa ucyate || 15 ||
athānugamajāpena niḥsvabhāvena cāruṇā |  vicāraṇaṁ tryadhvabuddhebhyo ratnajāpaḥ sa ucyate || 16 ||
śṛṇoti mantrākṣarapadaṁ svavajrairdhuṣṭamaṇḍalam |  krodhasamayajñānena krodhajāpaḥ sa ucyate || 18 ||
